SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddingMoodActivity
Activity for adding a new mood event.
CommentActivity
Activity that displays and posts comments related to a specific mood event.
CommentAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of user comments in a RecyclerView.
CommonSpaceActivity
CommonSpaceActivity with: - advanced filtering (mood, reason, last week) - text-based author search - "Request Follow" button logic - Swipe-to-refresh support.
CommonSpaceAdapter
Adapter for displaying mood events in the "Common Space" feed.
CommonSpaceAdapter.OnRequestFollowListener
interface to handle follow request actions.
EditMoodActivity
Activity for editing an existing mood event.
Emotion
Enum representing different types of emotions.
EmotionData
Utility class for retrieving emotion-related data.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FilterKeywordDialog
A DialogFragment that presents a dialog with an EditText for the user to input a keyword to filter items by.
FilterMoodDialog
A DialogFragment that presents a dialog with a list of mood options for the user to select from.
FolloweesAdapter
adapter for displaying the users that the current user is following.
FolloweesMoodsActivity
Displays up to three most recent moods of each user that the current user follows, from each user the current user is following.
FolloweesMoodsAdapter
Adapter for displaying the up to 3 most recent moods for each user that I follow.
FolloweesMoodsAdapter.UserMoodItem
represent a mood posted by a user that the current user follow.
FolloweesMoodsAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class for holding views in each mood item layout.
FollowingUsersActivity
Activity for displaying the list of users that the logged in user is following.
FollowManager
FollowManager handles all functionality related to following users.
FollowRequest
"FollowRequest" activity: lists all PENDING requests to the current user.
FollowRequestAdapter
Shows a list of PENDING follow requests to the current user.
FollowRequestAdapter.DecisionListener
Listener interface to handle accept and reject actions for follow requests.
FollowRequestAdapter.RequestItem
Represents a single follow request item from another user.
GlobalData
A naive global store for user-followed moods.
LocationEnum
Enum to choose if we we want to add a location
LoginActivity
LoginActivity handles user authentication including login and registration.
MainActivity
Main activity of the application.
mood_mapActivity
Activity that displays a map with markers representing mood events.
MoodEvent
Represents a mood event that tracks an individual's emotional state and associated information.
MoodHistoryAdapter
Adapter for displaying a list of mood history events in a RecyclerView.
MoodHistoryAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder for binding the views in each item of the RecyclerView.
MoodHistoryTests
Unit tests for the MoodHistory functionality.
ProfileActivity
ProfileActivity can show: - Your own profile (with buttons to logout, add mood, see follow-requests) - Another user's profile (hide those buttons).
SocialSituation
Enum representing different social situations that a person might experience during a mood event.
User
Represents a User with a username and password.
Usercomment
